name: Pass The Torch (Csquared44)
description:
Entry into Weekly Game Jam Week 168 

4 levels of a little puzzle about guiding a torch to the exit of a dungeon. With every step your fuel is depleted, so be diligent about your path! I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts below!

art via opengameart.org

Torch - XLIVE99

Environment - Matriax, LD luciddesignart.tk/, Kenney.nl
